2. Mainlib module¶

Пакет общих утилит, использующихся в разных модулях проекта.

2.1. Скрипт descriptors.py¶

Mainlib.descriptors Port

For port number descriptor: Validating the port.

Mainlib.descriptors IPAddress

The descriptor for the IP address: Validating the IP address

2.2. Скрипт exception.py¶

class Mainlib.exception.IncorrectDataRecivedError¶

Exception - Invalid data received from socket

class Mainlib.exception.ServerError(text)¶

Exception - Server Error

class Mainlib.exception.NonDictInputError¶

Exception - is the function argument is not a dictionary.

class Mainlib.exception.ReqFieldMissingError(missing_field)¶

Error - a required field is missing in the accepted dictionary

class Mainlib.exception.DataBaseInteractiveError¶

Database communication error

2.3. Скрипт verifier.py¶

class Mainlib.verifier.ServerVerifier(clsname, bases, clsdict)¶

Metaclass for checking server compliance

class Mainlib.verifier.ClientVerifier(clsname, bases, clsdict)¶

Metaclass for validating clients

2.4. Скрипт JIM.py¶

Mainlib.JIM get_message (client)

The utility for receiving and decoding a message accepts bytes and gives out a dictionary, if something else is received it gives a value error

Mainlib.JIM send_message (sock, message)

Message encoding and sending utility, takes a dictionary and sends it

2.5. Скрипт variables.py¶

Содержит разные глобальные переменные проекта.

Client for GB Learn Chat
